Dialog.Topics: Speaking English does matter. But almost all immigrants to the UK do.

Turn.Utterance: My step-father swears blind that, when he went to vote in the 1979 election (at the polling station that had previously been his primary school), the policeman on duty at the polling station told him that all teachers in Brent had to speak "Bangladeshi", because Ken Livingstone said so.
